text: Child's Play is a 1988 American supernatural horror movie set in Chicago. It was directed by Tom Holland. It stars Catherine Hicks, Chris Sarandon, Alex Vincent and Brad Dourif. The movie is about a serial killer doll named Chucky. It received moderate success upon release, and has gained cult following with the fans of horror. The movie is the first in the Child's Play franchise. A reboot remake was released in June 2019. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * Child's Play at Box Office Mojo Category:Child's Play movies Category:1988 horror movies Category:1988 thriller movies Category:1980s horror thriller movies Category:1980s serial killer movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:1988 independent movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Movies set in apartment buildings Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:American independent movies Category:Obscenity controversies Category:Cult movies
title: Child's Play (1988 movie)
